about_html:
MegaTrivia is a trivia game where you can choose between different trivia games, both created by me and contributed by other people.

The code for this project is licensed under GNU/GPL version 3 or newer.

Source code

MegaTrivia © 2013 - 2023 Alfonso Saavedra "Son Link".
